joker.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who behaves in a way you think is stupid
joker.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Look at that joker – he’s doing 25 miles an hour at the most.
joker.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a playing card that has no fixed value and is only used in some card games
joker.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone who makes a lot of jokes
